841ff7db-4feb-4054-a0b6-de4fd022982f.name: Impulsiveness
841ff7db-4feb-4054-a0b6-de4fd022982f.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

f33fed3a-ad58-4915-a2b5-eda21e11a112.name: Select level of night vision
f33fed3a-ad58-4915-a2b5-eda21e11a112.notes: 4 is fairly realistic, 9 is perfect, or use infravision

73b956d8-7bc4-4280-bfb9-e3b7743ed10d.name: Likes to hang around with wizards

b31c6a9e-f9f3-4412-8f8b-7c061a9dbc04.name: Curious
b31c6a9e-f9f3-4412-8f8b-7c061a9dbc04.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

2b6fa081-8c68-4146-9460-fd161efb8f1c.name: Imitative
2b6fa081-8c68-4146-9460-fd161efb8f1c.notes: Will habitually emulate other beings after spending a little time with them
